name: A Squirrel Adventure
description:
A nut-loving little squirrel wakes up in their little cave, craving more nut. Jump, glide and run through the forrest, collecting as many if not ALL the nuts hidden in the trees. Reach the top for a Grand Nut never seen before.(currently missing sound and music)

INGAME CONTROLLS:

Mouse = Menu navigation

A & D = Move left and right

Space = Jump

Hold space = Glide

Escape = Pause menu
